doc.name: mobileEnableAccelerometer
doc.summary: Enables the accelerometer so that accelerationChanged events are delivered.

description.overview: The mobileEnableAccelerometer command enables the accelerometer on the device.

parameters.parameter: The interval is specified in seconds and is the approximate time between delivery of messages.

description.comments:
The mobileEnableAccelerometer command will cause accelerationChanged events to be delivered to the current card of the defaultStack at the specified interval.
The interval is constrained by hardware-specific minimums and maximums (which are left unspecified by Apple).
